content.html: me: *reports slur to twitter* twitter immediately: *emails me to say no violation* me: *replies with "i was literally called a _______. this report was not reviewed. fuck off and get a PERSON to do this job"* twitter email 1 hour later: we locked the account for violations
content.value:
me: *reports slur to twitter*

twitter immediately: *emails me to say no violation*

me: *replies with "i was literally called a _______. this report was not reviewed. fuck off and get a PERSON to do this job"*

twitter email 1 hour later: we locked the account for violations
